task_description:
# Hit Detection & Slicing Feedback

Implement precise collision detection between slash trails and monsters, with satisfying visual and audio feedback on successful hits.

## Rationale
Satisfying hit feedback is crucial for game feel. Fruit Ninja's success comes from the visceral satisfaction of slicing. Web clones (pain-3-1) lack this polish.

## User Stories
- As a player, I want to feel a satisfying impact when I slice a monster so that every kill feels rewarding

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Slash lines accurately detect intersection with monster hitboxes
- [ ] Monsters split or explode with particle effects on hit
- [ ] Screen shake occurs on monster kills
- [ ] Audio plays on successful slash (unique per monster type)
- [ ] Visual blood/soul particles spawn at impact point
